results.title: Mechanisms underlying the ameliorative property of lisinopril in progressive mesangioproliferative nephritis.
results.text_hl: These results indicated that @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ in Thy-1.1 antibody-induced @DISEASE_Nephritis @DISEASE_MESH:D009393 @@@chronic nephritis@@@ is associated with a decrease in anionic charge sites on GBM, and that the antiproteinuric effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ is attributable to protection against @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@GEC damage@@@.

citations.NLM: Shinosaki T, Miyai I, Nomura Y, Kobayashi T, Sunagawa N, Kurihara H. Mechanisms underlying the ameliorative property of lisinopril in progressive mesangioproliferative nephritis. Nephron. 2002 Aug;91(4):719-29. PMID: 12138278
citations.BibTeX: @article{12138278, title={Mechanisms underlying the ameliorative property of lisinopril in progressive mesangioproliferative nephritis.}, author={Shinosaki T and Miyai I and Nomura Y and Kobayashi T and Sunagawa N and Kurihara H}, journal={Nephron}, volume={91}, number={4}, pages={719-29}}

results.title: Prevention of angiotensin II induced myocyte necrosis and coronary vascular damage by lisinopril and losartan in the rat.
results.text_hl: In @DISEASE_Hypertension_Renovascular @DISEASE_MESH:D006978 @@@renovascular hypertension@@@, the lowest dose of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ prevented vascular and attenuated @<m>DISEASE_Lead_Poisoning_Nervous_System</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020263 @@@myocyte damage@@@ but to a lesser degree than the higher doses.

citations.NLM: Kabour A, Henegar JR, Devineni VR, Janicki JS. Prevention of angiotensin II induced myocyte necrosis and coronary vascular damage by lisinopril and losartan in the rat. Cardiovasc Res. 1995 Apr;29(4):543-8. PMID: 7796449
citations.BibTeX: @article{7796449, title={Prevention of angiotensin II induced myocyte necrosis and coronary vascular damage by lisinopril and losartan in the rat.}, author={Kabour A and Henegar JR and Devineni VR and Janicki JS}, journal={Cardiovasc Res}, volume={29}, number={4}, pages={543-8}}
